text:
(a)     Establishment of Fund. The Public Works Street Damage Restoration Fund is established as a category eight fund for the purpose of receiving Street Damage Restoration Fee amounts paid pursuant to Section 
2.4.44 of the Public Works Code (Part II, Chapter 10 of the San Francisco Municipal Code). 
     (b)     Use of Fund. Monies in the Street Damage Restoration Fund shall be used exclusively for street resurfacing and reconstruction. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Director of the Department of Public Works may order refunds to be made from the Street Damage Restoration Fund consistent with procedures adopted pursuant to Section 
2.4.46 of the Public Works Code. 
(Added by Ord. 316-00, File No. 001911, App. 12/28/2000)

heading.catch_text: PUBLIC WORKS STREET DAMAGE RESTORATION FUND.
